title: Vercel’s Next.js 16: Explicit Caching, Turbopack Stability, and Improved Developer Tooling
description: Unlock the potential of full-stack web development with Next.js 16! This robust release features revolutionary Cache Components, enhanced routing, and Turbopack as the default bundler for lightning-fast builds. Experience architectural breakthroughs and AI-po…
content: Next.js, Vercel's React framework for building full-stack web applications, has recently released Next.js 16, shipping with a mix of architectural improvements, performance optimizations, and a funda… [+3859 chars]
